title: Breakfast in Paris
brief_description: A high-powered female fashion executive meets a handsome, carefree photographer and their relationship starts with hot glares and cold shoulders. Things don’t get much better for him until the romance of Paris catches up with her. Filmed on location in Paris. Stars Barbara Parkins, Rod Mullinar and Jack Lenoir.
